content.raw: It doesn't touch any header files, so I think it's fine, but it's good to be safe.
content.html: It doesn't touch any header files, so I think it's fine, but it's good to be safe.
I just kicked-off the ABI checker.

content.raw: Yeah, I cc'd @\_jrivero_ about it. The tests passed on my laptop so I clicked approve.
content.html: Yeah, I cc'd @_jrivero_ about it. The tests passed on my laptop so I clicked approve.

content.raw: mm looks like it didn't run any of the `dri_tests`
content.html: mm looks like it didn't run any of the dri_tests

content.raw:
There was an error with that build, so it didn't actually run the INTEGRATION_multicamera_sensor test. @\_jrivero_ see [console output](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-quantal-amd64-gpu-nvidia/522/consoleFull):
~~~
+ export DISPLAY=
~~~
I'll test it on my machine in the meantime.
content.html:
There was an error with that build, so it didn't actually run the INTEGRATION_multicamera_sensor test. @_jrivero_ see console output:

+ export DISPLAY=

I'll test it on my machine in the meantime.

content.raw: Added some expectations for cameras that have rotation component in pose, aada183, ba18441.
content.html: Added some expectations for cameras that have rotation component in pose, aada183, ba18441.

content.raw: I don't see any calls to GetWorldRotation in the test; I just see `Camera::GetWorldPose`. Can we add some expectations about GetWorldRotation as well?
content.html: I don't see any calls to GetWorldRotation in the test; I just see Camera::GetWorldPose. Can we add some expectations about GetWorldRotation as well?
